articles.title: Altermagnetic lifting of Kramers spin degeneracy - Nature.com
articles.description: Using photoemission spectroscopy and ab initio calculations, evidence is given of two distinct unconventional mechanisms of lifted Kramers spin degeneracy generated by the altermagnetic phase of centrosymmetric MnTe with vanishing net magnetization.
